urls.title: Voucher Terms and Conditions - Aer Lingus
urls.description: Vouchers can only be redeemed at aerlingus.com in respect of flights operated by Aer Lingus and cannot be redeemed for bookings that involve travel on flights operated by partner airlines. Vouchers cannot be redeemed through the Aer Lingus reservation offices, at airport ticket counters or at travel agents. Vouchers are valid for five years from the issue date. Vouchers can only be redeemed on aerlingus.com against the cost of Aer Lingus flights (including fares, taxes, charges and selected fees). Gift
